description.english: Finish the game any way you can
Complete the game for the "omnivorous" class
Complete the game for the "impartial" class
Complete the game for the "hater of evil" class
Complete the game for the "stoic" class
Complete the game for the "posthumous hero" class
Get the secret ending by playing for the "omnivorous" class
description.russian: Получите секретную концовку, играя за класс "всеядный"

description.russian: Получите секретную концовку, играя за класс "стоик"

description.english: Maximize any characteristic in the training area
description.russian: Прокачайте любую характеристику на максимум в тренировочном лагере

description.english: Receive a reward for bad karma
Receive a reward for good karma
Make a choice 10 times in a single journey

description.english: Equip Black crystal and Amulet of Forgotten Magic
description.russian: Экипируйте черный кристалл и амулет забытой магии
